original_text: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind: I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 바람 앞에 티끌 같이 부숴뜨리고 거리의 진흙 같이 쏟아 버렸나이다

sentences.original_text: Then did I beat them small as the dust
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 그들을 먼지처럼 작게 부수니

sentences.original_text: as the dirt in the streets.
